reviewText:
A marriage gone sour, husband then finds another woman, the Borchardt's divorce, and then the husband is found dead in his 1994 Jefferson, WI. home.

Son suspects mother, she fails to show up for police interview.  Case stalls; then after 4 months police get a tip that three teenagers were involved.  Another testifies she'd tried to recruit him to kill her husband and the teenager kept the drawing of the house Mrs. B. gave him.

All were convicted, with Mrs. B. eligible for parole at age 80+.
